sn51.20:4.1: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā honti mahānisaṃsā”.
sn51.20:5.1: Kathaṃ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, cattāro iddhipādā kathaṃ bahulīkatā mahapphalā honti mahānisaṃsā?
sn51.20:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti—
sn51.20:5.3: iti me chando na ca atilīno bhavissati, na ca atippaggahito bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṃ saṅkhitto bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhitto bhavissati.
sn51.20:5.5: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.20:5.6: yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho;
sn51.20:5.7: yathā divā tathā rattiṃ yathā rattiṃ tathā divā.
sn51.20:5.8: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.20:5.12: iti me vīmaṃsā na ca atilīnā bhavissati, na ca atippaggahitā bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṃ saṅkhittā bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhittā bhavissati.
sn51.20:5.14: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.20:5.15: yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho;
sn51.20:5.16: yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā.
sn51.20:5.17: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.20:8.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, ajjhattaṃ saṅkhitto chando?
sn51.20:8.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ajjhattaṃ saṅkhitto chando.
sn51.20:9.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, bahiddhā vikkhitto chando?
sn51.20:9.2: Yo, bhikkhave, chando bahiddhā pañca kāmaguṇe ārabbha anuvikkhitto anuvisaṭo—
sn51.20:9.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bahiddhā vikkhitto chando.
sn51.20:10.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pacchāpuresaññī ca viharati—
sn51.20:10.2: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure?
sn51.20:10.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pacchāpuresaññā suggahitā hoti sumanasikatā sūpadhāritā suppaṭividdhā paññāya.
sn51.20:10.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pacchāpuresaññī ca viharati—
sn51.20:10.5: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure.
sn51.20:11.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho viharati?
sn51.20:11.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tacapariyantaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati:
sn51.20:11.3: ‘atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā nakhā dantā taco maṃsaṃ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṃ vakkaṃ hadayaṃ yakanaṃ kilomakaṃ pihakaṃ papphāsaṃ antaṃ antaguṇaṃ udariyaṃ karīsaṃ pittaṃ semhaṃ pubbo lohitaṃ sedo medo assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā muttan’ti.
sn51.20:11.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho viharati.
sn51.20:12.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā viharati?
sn51.20:12.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yehi ākārehi yehi liṅgehi yehi nimittehi divā chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, so tehi ākārehi tehi liṅgehi tehi nimittehi rattiṃ chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti;
sn51.20:12.3: yehi vā pana ākārehi yehi liṅgehi yehi nimittehi rattiṃ chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, so tehi ākārehi tehi liṅgehi tehi nimittehi divā chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.20:12.4: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā viharati.
sn51.20:13.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti?
sn51.20:13.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ālokasaññā suggahitā hoti divāsaññā svādhiṭṭhitā.
sn51.20:13.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.20:16.3: idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ajjhattaṃ saṅkhittaṃ vīriyaṃ.
sn51.20:17.2: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, vīriyaṃ bahiddhā pañca kāmaguṇe ārabbha anuvikkhittaṃ anuvisaṭaṃ—
sn51.20:17.3: idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bahiddhā vikkhittaṃ vīriyaṃ … pe ….
sn51.20:18.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti?
sn51.20:18.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ālokasaññā suggahitā hoti divāsaññā svādhiṭṭhitā.
sn51.20:18.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.20:21.3: idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ajjhattaṃ saṅkhittaṃ cittaṃ.
sn51.20:22.2: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ bahiddhā pañca kāmaguṇe ārabbha anuvikkhittaṃ anuvisaṭaṃ—
sn51.20:22.3: idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bahiddhā vikkhittaṃ cittaṃ … pe …
sn51.20:22.4: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.20:25.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, ajjhattaṃ saṅkhittā vīmaṃsā?
sn51.20:25.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, ajjhattaṃ saṅkhittā vīmaṃsā.
sn51.20:26.1: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, bahiddhā vikkhittā vīmaṃsā?
sn51.20:26.2: Yā, bhikkhave, vīmaṃsā bahiddhā pañca kāmaguṇe ārabbha anuvikkhittā anuvisaṭā—
sn51.20:26.3: ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, bahiddhā vikkhittā vīmaṃsā … pe …
sn51.20:26.4: evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.20:26.5: Evaṃ bhāvitā kho, bhikkhave, cattāro iddhipādā evaṃ bahulīkatā mahapphalā honti mahānisaṃsā.
sn51.20:27.1: Evaṃ bhāvitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catūsu iddhipādesu evaṃ bahulīkatesu, anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti—
sn51.20:27.2: ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti … pe …
sn51.20:27.4: Evaṃ bhāvitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catūsu iddhipādesu evaṃ bahulīkatesu, āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
